name: Halloween Video Generator (Hailuo)
description: Create spine-chilling Halloween videos with Hailuo! Add eerie effects, spooky animations, and haunting edits to capture the Halloween spirit instantly.

params.prompt: A Halloween-themed illustration of a {{step1.output.gender}} in their 30s, dressed in a victorian {{workflow.parameters.clothing_style}}, holding a carved pumpkin in one hand. They are standing in front of a large full moon, with a spooky background featuring twisted trees, flying bats, and jack-o'-lanterns scattered around the scene. The expression is confident and slightly mischievous, fitting the eerie yet festive atmosphere. The color palette is dominated by dark oranges, blacks, and browns, creating a classic Halloween vibe.
